sentences.sContent: After rising through the air it stops to hover outside the window of a building several storeys high.
sentences.sContent_eng: After rising through the air it stops to hover outside the window of a building several storeys high.
sentences.sCn: 在空气中上升后，它在一幢几层楼高的建筑物的窗前停止升高，进入盘旋状态。

trans.tranOther: if a bird, insect, or  helicopter  hovers, it stays in one place in the air
